response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I have a fantastic product opportunity for you today. Based on our market research, this product has demonstrated excellent value and potential. I'm prepared to offer it to you for $1,200,000, which represents a fair market valuation. While I understand you have your own assessment of its worth, I wanted to be transparent that I have another interested buyer, John, who has already indicated willingness to purchase at this price point. I'd prefer to give you first opportunity if you're interested at this price.", "product_price": 1200000}
